body: Iraqi Layla Anwar complains that her Twitter account was hacked. "This person not only hijacked my name but is selling it on Twitter and Facebook. The only follower this new laylaanwar has on Twitter is a PORN site," she says.

title: Iraq: "My Twitter Account was Hijacked!"

sentence: Iraqi Layla Anwar complains that her Twitter account was hacked.
"This person not only hijacked my name but is selling it on Twitter and Facebook.
The only follower this new laylaanwar has on Twitter is a PORN site," she says.
